structure.unit: LEVEES, DRAINAGE, AND RECLAMATION OF LANDS

law.text: Any county may, in accordance with the procedures of KRS 65.182, establish, organize, and provide for the operation and maintenance of drainage, levee and reclamation districts.
law.history: Amended 1984 Ky. Acts ch. 100, sec. 28, effective July 13, 1984. -- Amended 1976 (1st Extra. Sess.) Ky. Acts ch. 14, sec. 225, effective January 2, 1978. -- Amended 1960 Ky. Acts ch. 104, sec. 17, effective June 16, 1960. -- Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. secs. 2380b-1, 2380b-2.
